blogPost.excerpt: Vmaker is an all-in-one video messaging tool encompassing a screen/webcam recorder, a player, and an in-built video editor. 📹 Vmaker provides the best-in-class Video Management System that gives a seamless experience with asset management. 📂
blogPost.body: Vmaker is an all-in-one video messaging tool encompassing a screen/webcam recorder, a player, and an in-built video editor. 📹 Vmaker provides the best-in-class Video Management System that gives a seamless experience with asset management. 📂
blogPost.title: Vmaker for Chrome - Asynchronous video messaging made easy
blogPost.author: Srinivasa Raghavan

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/网络摄像头录像机、播放器和内置视频编辑器于一体的视频信息传递工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的视频管理系统，为资产管理提供了无缝体验。📂
localize.tagline: 异步视频信息传递变得简单

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/網絡攝像頭錄像機、播放器和內置視頻編輯器於一體的視頻信息傳遞工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的視頻管理系統，爲資產管理提供了無縫體驗。📂
localize.tagline: 異步視頻信息傳遞變得簡單

previous.excerpt: EMOJIZ is a fun animated 3D emojis set which will bring joy to your designs or products. Optimized for White & Dark UI. Just drag & drop to your favorite design tool.
previous.title: EMOJIZ - Animated 3D emoji set with source files

localize.description: EMOJIZ是一个有趣的动画3D表情集，它将为您的设计或产品带来欢乐。为白色和黑暗的用户界面进行了优化。只需拖放到你最喜欢的设计工具。
localize.tagline: 带源文件的3D表情动画集。

localize.description: EMOJIZ是一個有趣的動畫3D表情集，它將爲您的設計或產品帶來歡樂。爲白色和黑暗的用戶界面進行了優化。只需拖放到你最喜歡的設計工具。
localize.tagline: 帶源文件的3D表情動畫集。

next.excerpt: Fancy Font is amazing tool which allows you to give a Fancy Look to your Smart Phone and app also facilitated you to create cool nickname for game too.
next.title: Fancy Fonts, Text and Nickname - Give fancy look to your phone & create unique game nickname

localize.description: Fancy Font是一款非常神奇的工具，它可以让你给你的智能手机起一个花哨的名字，同时也方便你给游戏起一个很酷的昵称。
localize.tagline: 给你的手机起个花哨的名字，创造独特的游戏昵称。

localize.description: Fancy Font是一款非常神奇的工具，它可以讓你給你的智能手機起一個花哨的名字，同時也方便你給遊戲起一個很酷的暱稱。
localize.tagline: 給你的手機起個花哨的名字，創造獨特的遊戲暱稱。
